subject: Relaxation in qualification criteria for Survey Engineer engaged by Independent Consultants as sub professional staff ongoing BOT Project.
text: HRdT 7rty TTT wfaah<ur T9 Phone 91-11.25074100/25074200 Taxa 73t 4Ra67 &r <TrHT T7TT4) 047 / Fax 91-11-25093507 1.25093514 ( TT % of India Q_ Extn, 2223 2318- / 2468 2553 #i " National Highways Authority (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transport and Highways) #-5W 6, #127-10, ERAT, #f facaft-110 075' G-5 & 6, Seclor-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 No: 11041/218/2007-Admn: January 2007 POLICY MATTERS: TECHNICAL (01/2007) [Decision taken on BOT Division's note] Sub: Relaxation in  qualification   criteria for  Survey Engineer   engaged by Independent Consultants a5 sub professional staff on  ongoing BOT Project: Keeping in view the severe shortage of Surveyors with Engineering Degree and the fact that very few graduate engineers choose surveying as a career; it has been decided to allow the , Independent  Consultant to field dipioma holders as Survey Engineers subject to them having the experience %f at least 10 years in te field of surveying out of which at least 5 years should be in Highway Projects and they should have also dealt with at least one project of similar nature and have experience with modern computer based method of surveying with total station and digital tevel: 2 The   remuneration in case of   diploma holder  fulfilling the above . criteria, if proposed by the Consultant would be reduced by 5 % from the remuneration quoted by ihe Consultant in the Financial Proposals. 35 This isgues with the approval of Chairman, NHAI Ih (G P CHAND) GENERAL MANAGER (ADMN) To PS to Chairman PSIPA to all MembersICGMsICVO AIF GMsIDGMs AII PIUs/CMUsISPVs Hindi OfficerILibrarian NHA 23rd
